verses.verse: And the LORD <WH3068> spoke <WH1696> unto <WH413> Moses, <WH4872> saying, <WH559>

Make <WH6213> thee two <WH8147> trumpets <WH2689> of silver; <WH3701> of a whole piece <WH4749> shalt thou make <WH6213> them: that thou mayest use <WH1961> them for the calling <WH4744> of the assembly, <WH5712> and for the journeying <WH4550> <WH853> of the camps. <WH4264>

And when they shall blow <WH8628> with them, all <WH3605> the assembly <WH5712> shall assemble themselves <WH3259> to <WH413> thee at <WH413> the door <WH6607> of the tabernacle <WH168> of the congregation. <WH4150>

And if <WH518> they blow <WH8628> but with one <WH259> trumpet, then the princes, <WH5387> which are heads <WH7218> of the thousands <WH505> of Israel, <WH3478> shall gather themselves <WH3259> unto <WH413> thee.
When ye blow <WH8628> an alarm, <WH8643> then the camps <WH4264> that lie <WH2583> on the east parts <WH6924> shall go forward. <WH5265>

When ye blow <WH8628> an alarm <WH8643> the second time, <WH8145> then the camps <WH4264> that lie <WH2583> on the south side <WH8486> shall take their journey: <WH5265> they shall blow <WH8628> an alarm <WH8643> for their journeys. <WH4550>
But when <WH853> the congregation <WH6951> is to be gathered together, <WH6950> ye shall blow, <WH8628> but ye shall not <WH3808> sound an alarm. <WH7321>

And the sons <WH1121> of Aaron, <WH175> the priests, <WH3548> shall blow <WH8628> with the trumpets; <WH2689> and they shall be <WH1961> to you for an ordinance <WH2708> forever <WH5769> throughout your generations. <WH1755>

And if <WH3588> ye go <WH935> to war <WH4421> in your land <WH776> against <WH5921> the enemy <WH6862> that oppresseth <WH6887> you, then ye shall blow an alarm <WH7321> with the trumpets; <WH2689> and ye shall be remembered <WH2142> before <WH6440> the LORD <WH3068> your God, <WH430> and ye shall be saved <WH3467> from your enemies. <WH4480> <WH341>

Also in the day <WH3117> of your gladness, <WH8057> and in your solemn days, <WH4150> and in the beginnings <WH7218> of your months, <WH2320> ye shall blow <WH8628> with the trumpets <WH2689> over <WH5921> your burnt offerings, <WH5930> and over <WH5921> the sacrifices <WH2077> of your peace offerings; <WH8002> that they may be <WH1961> to you for a memorial <WH2146> before <WH6440> your God: <WH430> I <WH589> am the LORD <WH3068> your God. <WH430>

And it came to pass <WH1961> on the twentieth <WH6242> day of the second <WH8145> month, <WH2320> in the second <WH8145> year, <WH8141> that the cloud <WH6051> was taken up <WH5927> from off <WH4480> <WH5921> the tabernacle <WH4908> of the testimony. <WH5715>

And the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> took <WH5265> their journeys <WH4550> out of the wilderness <WH4480> <WH4057> of Sinai; <WH5514> and the cloud <WH6051> rested <WH7931> in the wilderness <WH4057> of Paran. <WH6290>
And they first <WH7223> took their journey <WH5265> according to <WH5921> the commandment <WH6310> of the LORD <WH3068> by the hand <WH3027> of Moses. <WH4872>

In the first <WH7223> place went <WH5265> the standard <WH1714> of the camp <WH4264> of the children <WH1121> of Judah <WH3063> according to their armies: <WH6635> and over <WH5921> his host <WH6635> was Nahshon <WH5177> the son <WH1121> of Amminadab. <WH5992>
And over <WH5921> the host <WH6635> of the tribe <WH4294> of the children <WH1121> of Issachar <WH3485> was Nethaneel <WH5417> the son <WH1121> of Zuar. <WH6686>
And over <WH5921> the host <WH6635> of the tribe <WH4294> of the children <WH1121> of Zebulun <WH2074> was Eliab <WH446> the son <WH1121> of Helon. <WH2497>
And the tabernacle <WH4908> was taken down; <WH3381> and the sons <WH1121> of Gershon <WH1648> and the sons <WH1121> of Merari <WH4847> set forward, <WH5265> bearing <WH5375> the tabernacle. <WH4908>

And the standard <WH1714> of the camp <WH4264> of Reuben <WH7205> set forward <WH5265> according to their armies: <WH6635> and over <WH5921> his host <WH6635> was Elizur <WH468> the son <WH1121> of Shedeur. <WH7707>
And over <WH5921> the host <WH6635> of the tribe <WH4294> of the children <WH1121> of Simeon <WH8095> was Shelumiel <WH8017> the son <WH1121> of Zurishaddai. <WH6701>
And over <WH5921> the host <WH6635> of the tribe <WH4294> of the children <WH1121> of Gad <WH1410> was Eliasaph <WH460> the son <WH1121> of Deuel. <WH1845>
And the Kohathites <WH6956> set forward, <WH5265> bearing <WH5375> the sanctuary: <WH4720> and the other did set up <WH6965> <WH853> the tabernacle <WH4908> against <WH5704> they came. <WH935>

And the standard <WH1714> of the camp <WH4264> of the children <WH1121> of Ephraim <WH669> set forward <WH5265> according to their armies: <WH6635> and over <WH5921> his host <WH6635> was Elishama <WH476> the son <WH1121> of Ammihud. <WH5989>
And over <WH5921> the host <WH6635> of the tribe <WH4294> of the children <WH1121> of Manasseh <WH4519> was Gamaliel <WH1583> the son <WH1121> of Pedahzur. <WH6301>
And over <WH5921> the host <WH6635> of the tribe <WH4294> of the children <WH1121> of Benjamin <WH1144> was Abidan <WH27> the son <WH1121> of Gideoni. <WH1441>

And the standard <WH1714> of the camp <WH4264> of the children <WH1121> of Dan <WH1835> set forward, <WH5265> which was the rearward <WH622> of all <WH3605> the camps <WH4264> throughout their hosts: <WH6635> and over <WH5921> his host <WH6635> was Ahiezer <WH295> the son <WH1121> of Ammishaddai. <WH5996>
And over <WH5921> the host <WH6635> of the tribe <WH4294> of the children <WH1121> of Asher <WH836> was Pagiel <WH6295> the son <WH1121> of Ocran. <WH5918>
And over <WH5921> the host <WH6635> of the tribe <WH4294> of the children <WH1121> of Naphtali <WH5321> was Ahira <WH299> the son <WH1121> of Enan. <WH5881>
Thus <WH428> were the journeyings <WH4550> of the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> according to their armies, <WH6635> when they set forward. <WH5265>

And Moses <WH4872> said <WH559> unto Hobab, <WH2246> the son <WH1121> of Raguel <WH7467> the Midianite, <WH4084> Moses' <WH4872> father-in-law, <WH2859> We <WH587> are journeying <WH5265> unto <WH413> the place <WH4725> of which <WH834> the LORD <WH3068> said, <WH559> I will give <WH5414> it you: come <WH1980> thou with <WH854> us, and we will do thee good: <WH3190> for <WH3588> the LORD <WH3068> hath spoken <WH1696> good <WH2896> concerning <WH5921> Israel. <WH3478>
And he said <WH559> unto <WH413> him, I will not <WH3808> go; <WH1980> but <WH3588> I <WH518> will depart <WH1980> to <WH413> mine own land, <WH776> and to <WH413> my kindred. <WH4138>

And he said, <WH559> Leave <WH5800> us not, <WH408> I pray thee; <WH4994> forasmuch <WH3588> <WH5921> <WH3651> as thou knowest <WH3045> how we are to encamp <WH2583> in the wilderness, <WH4057> and thou mayest be <WH1961> to us instead of eyes. <WH5869>

And it shall be, <WH1961> if <WH3588> thou go <WH1980> with <WH5973> us, yea, it shall be, <WH1961> that what <WH834> goodness <WH2896> the LORD <WH3068> shall do <WH3190> unto <WH5973> us, the same will we do <WH3190> unto thee.

And they departed <WH5265> from the mount <WH4480> <WH2022> of the LORD <WH3068> three <WH7969> days' <WH3117> journey: <WH1870> and the ark <WH727> of the covenant <WH1285> of the LORD <WH3068> went <WH5265> before <WH6440> them in the three <WH7969> days' <WH3117> journey, <WH1870> to search out <WH8446> a resting place <WH4496> for them.
And the cloud <WH6051> of the LORD <WH3068> was upon <WH5921> them by day, <WH3119> when they went <WH5265> out of <WH4480> the camp. <WH4264>

And it came to pass, <WH1961> when the ark <WH727> set forward, <WH5265> that Moses <WH4872> said, <WH559> Rise up, <WH6965> LORD, <WH3068> and let thine enemies <WH341> be scattered; <WH6327> and let them that hate <WH8130> thee flee <WH5127> before <WH4480> <WH6440> thee.
And when it rested, <WH5117> he said, <WH559> Return, <WH7725> O LORD, <WH3068> unto the many <WH7233> thousands <WH505> of Israel. <WH3478>
